data.lyric:
[ti:LIKE I WANT YOU]
[ar:Giveon]
[al:LIKE I WANT YOU]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Like I Want You - Giveon
[00:10.08]Lyrics by：Giveon Evans/Sevn Thomas/Marcus Semaj
[00:20.16]Composed by：Sevn Thomas/Jahaan Sweet/River Tiber
[00:30.24]Sometimes I wish you knew
[00:33.28]But I disguise the truth
[00:36.20]I say I'm happy but I'm still stuck on us mm-mm-mm
[00:41.90]Does your mind play this game too
[00:45.49]Think 'bout me and you
[00:48.25]I guess I'll just pretend until it all makes sense hm-mm-hm hmm-hmm
[00:54.38]See you face to face I'm thinking 'bout the days we used to be
[00:59.88]But I can't make a scene but I can't make a scene
[01:06.48]See you face to face I'm thinking 'bout the days we used to be
[01:11.95]But I can't make a scene but I can't make it seem
[01:16.71]Like I want you
[01:21.29]You ooh ooh
[01:26.30]Even if it's true ooh
[01:30.18]Ooh-ooh-ooh
[01:35.32]Even if it's true
[01:42.23]I guess it's overdue
[01:45.21]Tell me your point of view
[01:48.14]Tell me am I to blame
[01:50.10]You're so good with change hm-hm-mm
[01:54.20]A table set for two
[01:56.46]You got me waitin' but you ain't comin' through
[01:59.36]Try to stay patient but gotta face the truth mm-mm-mm
[02:04.07]Oh woah-woah
[02:06.28]See you face to face
[02:07.50]See you face to face
[02:08.41]I'm thinking 'bout the days we used to be
[02:10.56]Thinking 'bout the days
[02:12.01]But I can't make a scene
[02:13.41]No I can't make a scene
[02:14.92]But I can't make a scene
[02:16.14]No no no no oh
[02:18.36]See you face to face
[02:19.33]See you face
[02:19.84]I'm thinking 'bout the days we used to be
[02:23.21]Oh-oh
[02:23.99]But I can't make a scene
[02:25.68]No no-no no-no
[02:26.97]But I can't make it seem
[02:28.72]Like I want you
[02:33.20]You ooh ooh
[02:38.51]Even if it's true ooh
[02:40.85]Even if it's true
[02:42.41]Ooh-ooh-ooh
[02:44.03]You babe
[02:47.31]Even if it's true
[02:53.42]There's no reason to believe I'll save us now
[02:57.25]But if you really love me say it now
[03:00.32]Why is it so hard to figure out
[03:03.14]I need you every day believe me when I say it
[03:16.88]Like I want you
[03:21.10]You ooh ooh
[03:26.45]Even if it's true ooh
[03:30.18]Ooh-ooh-ooh
[03:35.33]Even if it's true
data.trans:
[ti:LIKE I WANT YOU]
[ar:Giveon]
[al:LIKE I WANT YOU]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:10.08]//
[00:20.16]//
[00:30.24]有时我希望你能了解
[00:33.28]但我掩藏了真相
[00:36.20]我说我很快乐 但我还在为我们的爱耿耿于怀
[00:41.90]你脑海里是不是也在玩着这游戏
[00:45.49]想着你我
[00:48.25]我想我会就这样装下去 直到一切都能说通
[00:54.38]面对着面见到你 我回忆着我们曾经的日子
[00:59.88]但我不能跟你大吵大闹 但我不能跟你大吵大闹
[01:06.48]面对着面见到你 我回忆着我们曾经的日子
[01:11.95]但我不能跟你大吵大闹 但我不能让场面看起来是
[01:16.71]好像我在想你
[01:21.29]你
[01:26.30]即使事实就是如此
[01:30.18]//
[01:35.32]即使事实就是如此
[01:42.23]我想已经为时已晚
[01:45.21]告诉我你的想法如何
[01:48.14]告诉我 错是否在我
[01:50.10]你能如此从容地改变
[01:54.20]摆了两个人的桌子
[01:56.46]你让我等着你 但你并没有到来
[01:59.36]试着保持耐心 但总要面对现实
[02:04.07]//
[02:06.28]面对着面见到你
[02:07.50]面对着面见到你
[02:08.41]我回忆着我们曾经的日子
[02:10.56]回忆着我们曾经的日子
[02:12.01]但我不能跟你大吵大闹
[02:13.41]不 我不能跟你大吵大闹
[02:14.92]但我不能跟你大吵大闹
[02:16.14]//
[02:18.36]面对着面见到你
[02:19.33]看着你的脸
[02:19.84]我回忆着我们曾经的日子
[02:23.21]//
[02:23.99]但我不能跟你大吵大闹
[02:25.68]//
[02:26.97]但我不能让场面看起来是
[02:28.72]好像我在想你
[02:33.20]你
[02:38.51]即使事实就是如此
[02:40.85]即使事实就是如此
[02:42.41]//
[02:44.03]你 宝贝
[02:47.31]即使事实就是如此
[02:53.42]没有理由相信我会拯救我们
[02:57.25]但如果你真的爱我 那就告诉我
[03:00.32]为什么这么难想通
[03:03.14]我每天都很需要你 我这么说的时候要相信我
[03:16.88]好像我在想你
[03:21.10]你
[03:26.45]即使事实就是如此
[03:30.18]//
[03:35.33]即使事实就是如此
